name: Laser Sword Defense
description:
*** War is coming ***
* Defense your planet with your sword fight skill
* Upgrade HP, Combo, Dmg, Critical chance... to be stronger
* Have fun killing the droids
* Enjoy the thrilling combat with Bosses from the dark side
* Play on iphone, ipad or anywhere on your watch

*** GET it now, the fate of the galaxy is on your hand ***
